The London Plan provides an indicative benchmark for specialist housing for older people. The benchmark for Tower Hamlets is 45 units a year. Further need for both supported and specialist housing and housing for older people is set out in the Local Housing Need Assessment 2023. 12.48 Examples of specialist housing include: z sheltered housing – commonly self-contained homes with limited on site support (usually within use Class C3); z residential care homes – commonly bedsit rooms with shared lounges and eating arrangements (within use Class C2); z nursing homes – similar to residential care, but accommodating ill or frail elderly people, and staffed by qualified nursing staff (also within use Class C2);
